Text: Boxes is a soundtrack album by Australian band Icehouse, released by Festival Records / Chrysalis Records in November 1985.

Text: Boxes (Icehouse album):  The work was originally conceived by its composers, Iva Davies and Robert Kretschmer, in collaboration with choreographer Graeme Murphy of the Sydney Dance Company for performance as the ballet "Boxes".
